sentence.text: She had flattened the grass , burrowed down and made a cosy little nest for herself .
Sidelined again , I watched the cold wind flatten the grubby-looking grass of a weedy field outside Springburn .

Tonight , the moon was shrouded in rags of cloud and the wind flattened the grass and swiped at the trees as we passed .

Flatten the bread with a rolling-pin , then spread each slice thinly with mayonnaise .

I flattened my thin skirt between my bottom and the furry seat .
Take a piece of the almond paste and flatten it in the palm of your hand .
